## Install

``` sh
pip install exex
```

``` python
H2 = Gas('H2')
```

``` python
CO2 = Gas('CO2')
```

``` python
CH4 = Gas('CH4')
```

``` python
O2 = Gas('O2')
```

``` python
CO = Gas('CO')
```

``` python
r = Reaction(reactants=[H2, CO2], products=[CH4, O2, CO])
```

``` python
r.__dict__
```

``` python
system = System()
```

``` python
system.reactions['r'] = r
```

``` python
system.reactions['r']
```
